hotels module¶

class hotels.HotelSearch(app_id, app_key)¶

Bases: object

Class that represents search of hotels and its info. DynamicArray ADT in usage. Based on Goibibo API and needs app_id and app_key.

BASE = 'http://developer.goibibo.com/api/'¶
GetHotelPrice(city_id, check_in, check_out)¶

Gets the price information of all the available hotels in the given city. Creates a JSON file with all the info.

SearchHotelsByCity(city_id)¶

Gets a list of hotels available in a city alongwith information of each hotel. Creates a JSON file with all the info.

get_coordinates()¶

Returns the coordinations of the cheapest hotel.

research_id()¶

Reads the JSON file and returns all the identification numbers of needed hotels.

research_price()¶

Reads the JSON file and returns the dictionary of hotels IDs and their prices.

search()¶

Processes all the information and returns the best variant of hotel with the cheapest price, and its coordinations.

user_input(city)¶

Reads the CSV file and returns a city code.
